activities: The (i) collection, storing, analysis, processing, and deletion of personal data (including name, address, mass marketing statistics and other like tools), (ii) sending of marketing materials to recipients, and (iii) billing, account and payment processing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Yes, on-line and off-line customer data which may be manually processed, including employee data.
recoursemech: Cooperation with EU data protection authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner pursuant to the Safe Harbor certification.
